conclusion: No violation of Art. 10;No violation of Art. 11;No violation of P1-3

issue: Local Government and Housing Act 1989, sections 1(5), 2(2), 2(3) ;   Schedule to the Local Government Officers (Political Restrictions) 1990 Regulations, paragraphs 6 and 7 of Part II of the Schedule
scl: Vogt v. Germany judgment of 26 September 1995, Series A no. 323, p. 22, § 43, pp. 25-26, §§ 52, 53, p. 28, § 59;United Communist Party of Turkey and Others v. Turkey judgment of 30 January 1998, Reports of Judgments and Decisions 1998-I, pp. 21-22, § 45
